name: reflaxe-elixir
description: Haxe to Elixir compilation target using Reflaxe with Mix integration. Uses npm/lix for Haxe compiler development, mix for Elixir runtime testing.
author: Claude Code

scripts.build: echo 'Reflaxe.Elixir is a compiler - no build step needed'
scripts.test: make -C test -j8 && npm run test:elixir-validate && npm run test:mix
scripts.test:sequential: make -C test -j1 && npm run test:elixir-validate && npm run test:generator && npm run test:mix
scripts.test:with-validation: make -C test -j8 test-with-validation && npm run test:mix
scripts.test:mix: MIX_ENV=test mix deps.compile && MIX_ENV=test mix test --max-cases 1 --timeout 120000
scripts.test:mix-parallel: MIX_ENV=test mix deps.compile && MIX_ENV=test mix test --max-cases 4 --timeout 120000
scripts.test:examples: for dir in examples/*/; do echo "Testing $dir"; if [ -f "$dir/compile-all.hxml" ]; then (cd "$dir" && npx haxe compile-all.hxml) || exit 1; elif [ -f "$dir/build.hxml" ]; then (cd "$dir" && npx haxe build.hxml) || exit 1; fi; done
scripts.test:verify: npm run test:core && echo 'Core functionality verified ✅'
scripts.clean:generated: bash -c 'echo "Cleaning compiler-generated files..."; for dir in examples/*/lib test/snapshot/*/out test/snapshot/*/intended; do if [ -f "$dir/_GeneratedFiles.json" ]; then echo "Processing $dir"; (cd "$dir" && jq -r ".filesGenerated[]" _GeneratedFiles.json 2>/dev/null | while read -r file; do if [ -f "$file" ]; then echo "  Removing: $file"; rm "$file"; fi; done); elif [ -d "$dir" ]; then echo "Cleaning $dir (no manifest)"; find "$dir" -name "*.ex" -type f -delete 2>/dev/null; fi; done; echo "✓ Cleaned all compiler-generated files"'
scripts.setup: lix scope create && lix install haxelib:reflaxe
scripts.ci:guards: npm run guard:names && echo 'Name heuristics guard passed'
